name: Lottfl Rally (demo)
description:
Lottfl Rally

A rally game made using the Godot engine, Blender and gimp.

  • 1 car
  • 1 level
  • driving instructions

Once you open the game it will give you a pop up text that will have all the information on playing the game. All the controls etc.

Once you complete the level the game will save your highscore onto your hard drive btw, so dont play if youre not comfortable w that :D

Feel free to come comment what highscores u got!
